title: Network Folder Mapping
steps: Enter the network folder path in the address bar.

title: Guest Wi-Fi Connectivity
steps: Click on the Wi-Fi icon in the taskbar.
Select Hidden Network, then click Connect.
Enter the SSID: RCB_G (for Guest Wi-Fi).
Enter the Guest Wi-Fi password (provided daily by the IT team).

title: Proxy Configuration and Access Issues
steps: Press Windows + R, type inetcpl.cpl, and press Enter.
Go to the Connections tab → Click on LAN Settings.
Check Use a proxy server for your LAN.
Ensure Bypass proxy server for local addresses is checked.

title: Local Server Folder Mapping
steps: Enter the local server folder path.

title: Internet Connectivity Problems
steps: For Domain Wi-Fi: Ensure proxy settings are enabled.
For Home Network: Disable Use a proxy server for your LAN.

title: System Boot / Power-On Issues
steps: Desktop: Check power cable, press and hold Power button.
Laptop: Ensure battery is charged/charger connected, press and hold Power button.
If device doesn't start, contact IT Helpdesk Team.

title: Domain Login Problems
steps: Confirm Domain Username and Password are correct.
Avoid more than 3 incorrect attempts (to prevent account lock).
For unlock/reset, contact IT Helpdesk Team.

title: Lotus Mail Password Issues
steps: Confirm HCL Notes Username and Password are correct.
Accounts may lock after 3 incorrect attempts or 10 days inactivity.
To unlock/reset, contact IT Helpdesk or email via HCL Verse mobile app.

title: Creating New Archive Files in Lotus Notes
steps: Select folder path to save archive, enter same name.

title: Software Installation or Malfunction
steps: Contact IT Helpdesk for software installation.
Restart the application/system for basic troubleshooting.
If issue persists, contact IT Team.
